subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: For months, the identity of the boy who was sexually assaulted in the locker-room showers by Jerry Sandusky was one of the biggest mysteries of the Penn State scandal.
snippet: For months, the identity of the boy who was sexually assaulted in the locker-room showers by Jerry Sandusky was one of the biggest mysteries of the Penn State scandal.
